attributes.action: stigma over male domestic abuse victims
attributes.additional_details: i am sean richards i was attacked by my wife who was also my sole carer as i am disabled, she left me with two fractures and two holes in my left temple, the Humberside police and CPS. have made me feel like i diserved it there won't prosecute there say she had scratched and marks but i wittness statement proves other wise i have been let down. you here more about female abuse and all the help from goverment , police , Cps but we men don't receive any.
